bibliographic-data.invention-title: Dynamic Pricing Models for Digital Content

abstract.p: Dynamic pricing models which facilitate efficient distribution of digital content online. Particular implementations of the invention dynamically base pricing for digital content on relatively current, aggregated information regarding Internet user behavior and preferences, such as search query and/or page hit logs. Some implementations of the present invention are directed to pricing digital content based on the inherent properties of digital content and the mechanics of how electronic files are typically distributed on the Internet.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: DYNAMIC PRICING MODELS FOR DIGITAL CONTENT
MODÈLES DE TARIFICATION DYNAMIQUE POUR UN CONTENU NUMÉRIQUE

nplcit.text: The technical aspects identified in the present application (art. 56 EPC) are considered part of common general knowledge. Due to their notoriety no documentary evidence is found to be required. For further details see the accompanying Opinion and the refernce below. XP002456414

bibliographic-data.invention-title: DYNAMIC PRICING MODELS FOR DIGITAL CONTENT
DYNAMIC PRICING MODELS FOR DIGITAL CONTENT
MODÈLES DE TARIFICATION DYNAMIQUE POUR UN CONTENU NUMÉRIQUE

abstract.p: Dynamic pricing models which facilitate efficient distribution of digital content online. Particular implementations of the invention dynamically base pricing for digital content on relatively current, aggregated information regarding Internet user behavior and preferences, such as search query and/or page hit logs. Some implementations of the present invention are directed to pricing digital content based on the inherent properties of digital content and the mechanics of how electronic files are typically distributed on the Internet.

L'invention concerne des modèles de tarification dynamique qui facilitent une distribution rentable d'un contenu numérique en ligne. Des mises en uvre particulières de l'invention fondent dynamiquement la tarification pour un contenu numérique sur des informations agrégées relativement courantes concernant les comportements et les préférences des utilisateurs d'Internet tels que les demandes de recherche et/ou les journaux d'appel de fichier. Certaines mises en uvre de l'invention concernent la tarification d'un contenu numérique en se fondant sur les propriétés inhérentes du contenu numérique et la mécanique du mode de distribution typique des fichiers électroniques sur Internet.
